item.description:
Please join us, Leticia and Robert, for a game night at our house in Salem. As those of you who have met us know, we love the Euro Gamage. Thank you, Liv, Keiran and Josh, we have now purchased a copy of Dominion. Oh, yes. We almost made this just a Dominion night, which will be coming in the future, but there were some other games we liked too, so we at least thought we could keep it open a little. Mayfair games also rock, so if you want to bring your fav or try one of ours that would be cool too.

We will have drinks and snacks but if you are so inspired to bring something, we welcome it. We thank you all for your generosity - we love you, we love your food.

We have two cats that are mostly in the basement. Please email or call me with any questions or concerns. 978-744-7644. Thanks and can't wait to see you all!

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Euro Game Night
